§7In order to create a §cFaction§7, type the §cname of the Faction §7you'd like to have below!

§8Allowed characters: a-Z, 0-9, #@$_

§7In order to §4disband §7your §cFaction:
§7Type the §cname of your Faction §7below!

§8Faction Name: %s

§7Type the name of the §cplayer §7that you would like to invite to this §cFaction!

§8Heads up: The player must be online!

f_invites_menu.title: §cFaction §7| §8Invites
f_invites_menu.desc:
§7This is a list of Faction Invites you have received from various factions.
Click on a Faction name to review your invite!
